name: Many Splendid Things
description: A long life has left Pelia with a tendency to pick up what others leave behind. And the anomaly crisis has left her with no shortage of collection opportunities. But not everyone is enthusiastic about her hobby.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Admiral Robert April, any version of Pike, Pelia, Hemmer, Explorers, or Strange New Worlds crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Admiral Robert April, Pike, Pelia, Hemmer, Explorers, or Strange New Worlds crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Ketoul
featured_crew.flavor: Neera serves as Una’s lawyer in her court martial. Skeptical of Starfleet, she works to show the injustice done to Una - and all Illyrians.

action.name: I Am Not The Biggest Fan of Starfleet

featured_crew.name: Pelia
featured_crew.flavor: Teaching at the Academy bored Pelia. Therefore, she helped the crew steal the Enterprise, thanks to which she took the position of chief engineer.

action.name: If You're Going To Steal a Starship, Do It Correctly

featured_crew.name: Hemmer
featured_crew.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Ketoul
rewards.flavor: Neera serves as Una’s lawyer in her court martial. Skeptical of Starfleet, she works to show the injustice done to Una - and all Illyrians.

action.name: I Am Not The Biggest Fan of Starfleet

rewards.name: Hemmer
rewards.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

adventures.name: Uprooted
adventures.description: Repair the lalogi orb of a prominent Akaali family.

adventures.name: Return the Uncollectable
adventures.description: Return Lt. Commander Data's head to San Francisco.

adventures.name: A Hole in My Bucket
adventures.description: Return Odo's bucket - with Odo inside - to Deep Space Nine!

adventures.name: Certified Curator
adventures.description: Establish Pelia as a collector in good standing.

rewards.name: Many Splendid Things
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Hemmer
rewards.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

rewards.name: Pelia
rewards.flavor: Teaching at the Academy bored Pelia. Therefore, she helped the crew steal the Enterprise, thanks to which she took the position of chief engineer.

action.name: If You're Going To Steal a Starship, Do It Correctly

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Ensure artifacts are returned with the Bajorans.

potential_rewards.name: Bajoran Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Bajoran faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Assess the valuables with the Ferengi Alliance.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Propose a trade with the Ferengi Traditionalists.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "The Collector's Guild has been on my back for weeks about some rare artifact you have in 'mint' condition. The Klingons insist you have a ceremonial blade. And did I read you have an Augment embryo? That's not even the start of my list, let alone La'an's."

"It's only 'mint' because I treasure and take care of things, unlike the Guild. That blade was found at an old Hurq outpost while I was on sabbatical. I was restoring it. The Augment thing? Don't ask questions you don't want answers to."
"Is that why you were keeping all of that in the transporter's pattern buffer? Along with all this other junk?"
"Well, that explains why we've been having so many issues as of late. I'll have to apologize to M'Benga later. Captain, think you can help us sort through all of this?"
